abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Wobbuffet from your hand onto Wynaut (this counts as evolving Wynaut), and remove all damage counters from Wynaut.

effect.en: Search your deck for a Basic Pok√©mon card or Evolution card for each Energy attached to Wynaut, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
